extendedInfo.description: 2012 Car & Driverâs 10 Best Technology winner!2012 Popular Mechanics Editorâs Choice award winner!2012 CES Innovations in Design & Engineering award winner!2012 SEMA Show Best New Mobile Electronic Product award winner!ESCORT Users are saying: âThese advanced laser alerts are a life saver. Love it!ââThe new update just released has made the experience with Escort Live even greater.ââI've been using Escort Live since early December, have taken one 3,000 mile trip (Florida to Massachusetts and back) and use it every time I get into the car. âESCORT Liveâ¢ delivers the worldâs most advanced real time radar and laser ticket protection giving drivers an unprecedented, advanced information picture of their driving environment. The result is an ESCORT Liveâ¢ nation of drivers connected in the social network for the road. ESCORT Live is available in two versions: ESCORT Liveâ¢ Free Download:â¢	âReal time Police Spottedâ speed trap alertsâ¢	Mobile/Speed Camera, and Redlight Camera alertsâ¢	Muliticolor Speedometer screensâ¢	Ability to share your threat reports in the ESCORT Liveâ¢ networkâ¢	ESCORTâs patented Mark Locationâ¢ feature which allows drivers to receive automatic reminders for previously marked threatsâ¢	Multiple map and dashboard views on your smartphone based on user preferenceESCORT Live Premium:â¢	Real-time radar and laser alerts received by other detector users in the areaâ¢	Detailed threat information including time sensitive, âheat-mappedâ color coded warning icons for fast, safe and more accurate responsesâ¢	ESCORTâs patented GPS full feature set including: vehicle speed; posted speed limit data; over speed limit alerts; compass and directional headingsâ¢	Ability to easily connect to ESCORTâs class leading windshield mount radar detectors using ESCORTâs new Bluetooth enabled SmartCord Liveâ¢ power cord (select models only â visit ESCORTradar.com for details)â¢	Full access to ESCORT Nationâ¢	Two convenient levels of subscription service â $4.99 per month or $49.99 per yearDid you know, â¢	Radar detectors are legal in 49 states (only Virginia prohibits their use)â¢	Multiple public domain sources reveal that more than 50 million drivers receive a speeding ticket in the United States each year â about one in every four driversâ¢	It is estimated that there are currently more than 60 million potential ESCORT Liveâ¢ compatible smartphones in use in North America with numbers increasing dailyNow you do, and ESCORT Live is here to help you Drive Smarter! Whether youâre using one of our industry-leading detectors or simply using Escort Live on your smartphone, weâre here to keep you safe on the road and ticket free. Take us for a drive TODAY!  - ESCORTradar.com/escort-live Note: ESCORT Live can be run in the background to preserve battery life of your smartphone.

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: I really like the idea behind this and the software works well. Unfortunately I can go weeks, sometimes months without seeing an alert posted by another user. So far they have waived the subscription fee but when it comes time to pay for it, it will be a tough decision whether to keep it.
reviews.author: Marvyn Harris

reviews.title: Don\'t pay it
reviews.comment: Escort can\'t fix the app. They come out with new update and it only makes things worse..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not recognising my subsription  not giving me full access.
reviews.comment: My a ccount was hit for $4.99 on 7/17/13 FOR PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION BUT KEEPS ASKING ME TO SUBSCRIBE WHEN I LOG IN & DOES NOT GIVE ME PREMIUM SERVICE
reviews.author: Daniel Myer

reviews.title: Works well, but...
reviews.comment: About half the time, maps don\'t show up. Would be nice if integrated with a navigator.
reviews.author: Joy Hutchins

reviews.title: Fixed!
reviews.comment: This update fixed the crash error the moment Bluetooth connection is established. Samsung Galaxy S3, Android 4.2.1, Escort 9500ix. Glad app is working again
reviews.author: Bill Schulte

reviews.title: This @&$# Works!!!!
reviews.comment: On my way down to Florida and am using the app in conjuction with my Escort 9500ix radar detector.   This app works!  Thank you to the person 11 minutes ahead of me that marked the NC State Trooper.  The app warned me of his location before my detector did.  The more users marking locations, the better this app is.
reviews.author: Corey M

reviews.title: Great application and integration with detector
reviews.comment: Latest update fixed the connectivity issue between the app and my 9500ix.  (Thanks)  5 enhancement requests:  1) Provide ability to adjust speed.  App shows a 1-3 mph difference from speedometer  2) Provide ability to report/record speed (by GPS location)  where the app\'s data is incorrect (ie construction zone)  3) Allow user to set a specific number for \'over speed limit\' warning/  4) Build a night mode  5) Adjust auto reporting of Ka band for when the patrol car is moving  Overall, great app and service
reviews.author: Bill Zwigard

reviews.title: A lot better since update.
reviews.comment: App is once again working.. Could use some tweaking but I\'m happy that it isn\'t crashing every 30 seconds.
reviews.author: Sean Huggins

reviews.comment: The new update fixed the crashes issues , please work on night mode for the map and alert sound that comes out from the radar itself not the phone.\tThe new update crashes once I open the application . Please fix Asap and make the previous update available until you fix the new update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.comment: This android app doesn\'t integrate w/ google nav or other mapping apps. Extremely little progress in almost 2 years.
reviews.author: rd Thrush

reviews.title: Great app. Download now!
reviews.comment: The app works great but I give it 4 stars because it needs a widget. The start up is a little too slow.
reviews.author: Elijah Landry

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: How do I turn on the bluetooth auto launcher feature? My phone connects automatically but doesnt open the app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used with escort max!
reviews.comment: talked to escort, when using max with escort live if you are not speeding when you get an alert the max will double beep and then mute. This could be a problem if the speed limit on that road is off. If you are over the posted speed max will fully alert!  There needs to be a way to override this feature!  Transammatt
reviews.author: transammatt

reviews.title: Stable and working now
reviews.comment: Everything seems to be working now. There are still improvements but it\'s working and functional again.
reviews.author: Brian Randles

reviews.title: PEWS DETECTOR ;-)
reviews.comment: Excellent PEWS Detection! (Piggly Early Warning System) and a FINE example of The People watching THEIR Government with computers instead of the OTHER way around, for a change! This might keep you out of small town Ohio\'s Kangaroo Court \"system\".... Still too many \"New Rome, Ohio\" (Google THAT for a \"former\" Speed Trap Horror Story) places around in an otherwise wonderful State.
reviews.author: William Pietschman

reviews.title: Bugs galore-Samsung Note II
reviews.comment: This app tends to connect when it wants to do so.  It will no longer post my own alerts from radar or LIDAR.  It will only post \"police spotted\".  I find this very aggravating for a paid app.  Another complaint is that the is not a dim or night mode for this app.  It is already a battery hog but it doesn\'t have to be if the screen can dim.   I find the lack of knowledgeable support and too frequent updates disturbing.   I am not a computer expert but a high schooler grad could fugure this out.
reviews.author: Jeff Clark

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: But it would be nice if landscape mode would auto rotate with the phone orientation so that I could angle it any which way.
reviews.author: Chris Lopez-Linus

reviews.title: 8-2013 Upgrade a big improvement
reviews.comment: Latest upgrade is big improvement but still quirky bluetooth and gps interface. Worked well on cross-country trip.
reviews.author: Frank Faris

reviews.title: Good App - One Glitch.
reviews.comment: I\'m glad to report that the crashing problem related to the update has been resolved.  This version seems to be working properly with one exception.  The app makes my detector alert on locked out signals with no way to mute the sound. Kinda annoying and defeats the purpose of locking routine signals out.
reviews.author: Billy Lamb

reviews.title: Not bad considering...
reviews.comment: The application does pretty much what it says it\'s going to do. It however seems to have problem with certain phone models. It would be wise to call Escort Customer Service before you plunk down the cash for the Live Cord. Having said that, it is a pretty useful tool. Like most every product that uses your GPS and Bluetooth, it is hungry for battery power. It does help convert your Radar Detector into a semi-police detector with the help of fellow motorists. It\'s worth it.
reviews.author: Mike Dills
